Welcome to Your Product Value Canvas (PVC) Session

You’ve already mapped your customer’s world in the CVC interview; now we’ll zero-in on what your product or service must deliver to create real, “can’t-live-without-it” value. In the next conversation, you’ll speak with our PVC Interviewer (also voice-enabled via ElevenLabs) while the on-page chatbot organises every insight in the background. When we’re done, you’ll have a crystal-clear list of Features, Pain-Relievers, and Gain-Creators ready for the Fit Workshop.

Meet Your PVC Interviewer

Picture a product strategist with the bedside manner of a coach:

  • Starts by anchoring to the pains and gains you surfaced in the CVC.
  • Digs for the functional facts — features, workflows, proof-points.
  • Probes the “so-what?” layer: How does this remove a pain? How could it delight?
  • Summarises each block (Features ▸ Pain-Relievers ▸ Gain-Creators) so you can confirm or refine on the spot.

Quick Prep – 5 Minutes Tops

Have these notes (or rough thoughts) within reach:

  1. Top 5 product features your buyers rave about.
  2. Proof of impact: metrics, case-study wins, testimonials.
  3. Secret sauce / differentiators you’re proud of.
  4. Known constraints (lead-times, integrations, pricing quirks).
  5. Any future features you’re considering.

Don’t sweat perfect wording; raw bullets are fine — the interviewer turns them into structured canvas blocks.

Step-by-Step Instructions

Friendly Tips

  • Think benefits, not just specs — e.g., “one-click sync that saves 3 hours” is gold.
  • Stories beat bullet points: share a customer quote if you have one.
  • If a prompt feels off-target, just say so; the interviewer will pivot.
  • Say “pause” anytime you need a breather, then “resume”.
  • Keep background noise low (mute icon is top-right).

Ready?

Hit Start Interview below and let’s translate your product’s superpowers into a value map your customers can’t ignore — all in the same warm, genuine tone you know from our first session.
